participant_1.background:
I'm worried that I might fail my upcoming exams.
I am a retired cook who enjoys spending time with my grandchildren.
i am deathly terrified of heights.
i like pepsi.
I'm tall, even for my family, and I love going to Comic Con.

participant_2.background:
I'm not into Comic Con, but I have a great time with my family.
I wake up early and stretch before getting ready for my day.
I used to wear tight clothes, but now I prefer more comfortable options.
I loved playing with my dog as a child.
I like listening to chill music to help me relax and focus on my studies.

content.text: Hello there! How is your day going?
Good! I woke up early and stretched before getting ready. How about you?
Good, a bit nervous about my upcoming exams.
Oh no, I hope you do well! What are you studying?
I am studying chemistry, it's not my favorite subject but I have to get through it.
I can relate, I used to hate math but I got used to it!
I wish I could say the same!
I know it's hard, but you can do it! Just remember to take breaks and study in a way that works for you.
Thank you for the encouragement! I'll try my best!
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great!
Hey, I was wondering, what do you like to do for fun?
I love going to Comic Con and spending time with my grandchildren.
Comic Con looks like so much fun! I've never been, but I would love to go one day.
You should! It's a great place to meet people and see all sorts of amazing things.
I will have to check it out!
